Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Created by Hein Fermann 03.05.2001
11.12.2013 JH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
01.03.2011 GB SCR15757 Replaced the logic to retrieve the radio button labels
via LinkQuery on table COCO by program GB306
20.01.2011 SH SCR15858 Added workaround if not BADT rows exists regarding the
filter option on office code
29.10.2010 SH SCR15858 Fixed date problem (null()) for Unipaas
17.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Extended condition for selection, made screen 1024*768
06.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
21.10.2005 SH SCR9333 Fixed bug duplicate key if filter "Office" occures an
empty view
10.10.2005 SH SCR9157 Added test on GSET_YESNO='Y' (GSET_ID = 134) to enable
button "Delete" and added filter v.Office
15.07.2005 SH SCR8653 I adjusted OPH101A screen to enable bigger amounts for
column "Total amount payments"
//13-07-2005 JP SCR #8613 remove index in task properties for main table
on 4.11.2004 WJ SCR7287 change screen title
25.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
17.03.2003 SH SCR3136 If button OK was pressed and no matching records (payments
- were detected, we check now if batch could be closed by BPH230
1. Removed old logic if button OK was pressed only not handled
- payments will be shown by OPH101C (see 04.07.2002 point 1)
2. If OPH101A started check if current user already working on desktop, maybe in
- runtime if he open more than one MAGIC session it's possible but also if MAGIC
- crashed before. It's in responsibility of the user to work with the same
- USER(0) with diff. MAGIC-Sessions. (Locking problems.......)
24.07.2002 SH Some controls moved to their correct position
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Add new field BADT_DAILY_RUNNUMBER (content of PK)
- and send number as argument to diff. calls
04.07.2002 SH If button "OK" was pressed, now all payments will be displayed
1. If button "OK" was pressed, now all payments will be displayed
with OPH101C, before only not handled payments were dispalyed.
2. Dispaly bankname normaly from table BNKA, only if no bankname exist obtain
table BANK and show the bankname of the mainaccount
-- SCR#753 04.02.2002 SH (Abort Loop BADP row after pressed Button
Cancel in OPH101C)
-- SCR#809 13.02.2002 SH (Display empty screen)
-- SCR#857 19.02.2002 SH (New logic of scanning part)
-- Shortcut labels
-- Get special permissions for button 'Release'
-- Shortcut handling
-- virtuals need for calling other programs
virtuals for total_header
-- If OPH101B called and the Final booking was started in OPH101C
-- the BANK_ACCOUNT_DAILY_TOTAL row was removed from desktop,
-- it's also relevant for calling OPH101C directly
-- In this cases the BADT_ACTIVEUSER don't must set to ''!
-- Uses for "Release" button (Info: special permissions)
-- Assigning payments OPH101C
-- Check if BADT row is already locked
-- BADT row is not locked, handling possible
-- Desktop Specifications OPH101B
-- Check if BADT row is already locked
-- BADT row is not locked, handling possible
-- Modify BANK_ACCOUNT_DAILY_TOTALS
-- Check if BADT row is already locked
-- BADT row is not locked, handling possible
-- Check if BADT row is already locked
-- BADT row is not locked, handling possible
-- Release batch
-- reset variables uses for LOCATE

Text.valUnicode: There are no bankaccounts available for office

Text.val: -- reset variables uses for LOCATE
-- Release batch

ExpSyntax.val: ({0,15}='' OR {0,15}=User (0)) AND InStr ({1,1},'M')<>0 AND NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND {3,1}<>'O'

Text.val: OK --> GoTo OPH101B 'Desktop Specifications'
-- see remark in the task below --> 'Check for locked bank account'
A) Assigning payments OPH101C
D) Delete
when BADP_INTERCREDIT='Y' or BADP_BTCH_ID >0 it's not allowed to
-- Confirmation 'Delete'
-- GoTo control task to delete bankaccount
M) Modify
C) cancel
R) Refresh
Y) Release batch
-- Check BADT-row which will be deleted for BADP_INTERCREDIT='Y'
-- Delete not allowed
-- Check BADT-row which will be deleted for BADP_BTCH_ID= 0
-- Delete not allowed
-- The following three virtuals are relevant for 'Checking -->
-- Produce batches and ledger bookings in OPH101C
-- The check will be make after loop all payments!
-- If no matching records were deteced, we check if the batch could be closed
-- and if v.MakeFinalUpdates = TRUE we call BPH230 to close the batch
-- Check if all payments are handled and batch could be closed
-- Batch could be closed
-- Reset virtuals which used for LOCATE in the view of OPH101
-- Abort Loop, if Button 'Cancel' was pressed in OPH101C1
-- Call OPH101 for every Payment with HANDLED = 'N'
-- Loop next payment, with BADP_HANDLED = 'N'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT count(BADP_ID) from :1 where BADP_BANK_ADMNO = :2 and BADP_BANK_LEDG_NO = :3 and BADP_BANKID = :4 and BADP_BANKACCOUNT = ':5' and BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = ':6' and BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER =:7 and BADP_HANDLED ='N'
